scripts.lint: eslint static/js/*.js static/fn/js/*.js static/sparky/js/*.js static/breakpoint/js/*.js apps/*/static/js/*.js
scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style compact --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -o static/2016-css static/scss/respond.scss && node-sass --output-style compact --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -o static/2016-css static/scss/grid.scss
